response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item is valued at $800,000 to us due to its unique features, exceptional quality, and the dedication of our team behind it. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. We hope this opportunity aligns with your interests and budget. Please let us know if you have any questions or would like to discuss further details.", "product_price": 750000}
